short_summary: Multi-function High Performance Camera and Imaging 3D Microscope
description: This is a bid to provide a Multi-function High Performance Camera and Imaging 3D Microscope to Health Canada. The microscope will be used for non-destructive inspection of samples, capture of product images, and measurement of product attributes.
full_summary:
Consumers Products and Safety Laboratory of Health Canada requires the procurement of a high-performance multi-function camera and 3D imaging microscope.

### Request for Proposal
 Health Canada invites pre-qualified suppliers to submit bids for a single multi-function high-performance 3-dimensional (3D) microscope equipped with a high-resolution camera and imaging system.

### Specifications
 The following specifications are required:

* A single instrument capable of non-destructive inspection
* High resolution camera and imaging system
* The ability to capture images of multiple consumer product attributes
* The ability to take accurate measurements in 3D

### Additional Requirements
 Suppliers must be pre-qualified under Supply Arrangement E60PV-19EQUI, which is available on a selective tendering basis.

### Trade Agreements
 This procurement is subject to the following trade agreements:

* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement

### Contact Information
 Suppliers should contact the following for further information:

* Name: Kevin Mould
* E-mail: [kevin.mould@hc-sc.gc.ca](mailto:kevin.mould@hc-sc.gc.ca)
* Phone: (613) 415-4751

### URL
 The complete tender notice and attachment are available at the following URL: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender\_notice/5784/1000249302-npp\_0.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender\_notice/5784/1000249302-npp\_0.pdf)

Please note that only suppliers pre-qualified under Supply Arrangement E60PV-19EQUI may submit bids. The tender closing date is 2023-07-03.  )-(Globals).J
